#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    set<int> s1,s2,s3;

    long long int a,b,c,t,i,temp;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--)
    {
        cin>>a>>b>>c;
                long long int a1=0,a2=0,a3=0,a4=0;

        for(i=0;i<a;i++)
        {
            cin>>temp;
            s1.insert(temp);
        }

        for(i=0;i<b;i++)
        {
            cin>>temp;
            s2.insert(temp);
            if(s1.find(temp)!=s1.end())
                a1++;
        }
        for(i=0;i<c;i++)
        {
            cin>>temp;
            s3.insert(temp);
            if(s2.find(temp)!=s2.end())
                a2++;
                if(s1.find(temp)!=s1.end())
                a3++;
                 if(s2.find(temp)!=s2.end()&&s1.find(temp)!=s1.end())
                a4++;
        }

        cout<<a1<<" "<<a2<<" "<<a3<<" "<<a4<<endl;
s1.erase(s1.begin(),s1.end());
s2.erase(s2.begin(),s2.end());
s3.erase(s3.begin(),s3.end());

        a1=0;
        a2=0;
        a3=0;
        a4=0;


    }

    return 0;

}
